it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.provider

Class CoapURI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.provider.CoapURI

  • public class CoapURI
extends java.lang.Object
    CoAP URI. It includes both "coap" and "coaps" schemes.

      Creates a new CoAP URI.
